title: Configure SACM
content:
You can control where your assets are managed. You can include them in the Service Management Service Asset and Configuration ManagementÂ (SACM) database. Or you can manage them in an external database, such as a local instance of UCMDB. Your decision depends on your local environment, the requirements of your customers, and your business use case scenarios.
